| HistoryText             = The nurses of New Beulah Hospital were disciples of [[Zadkiel (Earth-616)|Zadkiel]]. They were charged with guarding their patient, [[Lucas Collier (Earth-616)|Lucas Collier]]. Madam, the head nurse, initially prevented [[Johnathon Blaze (Earth-616)|Johnny Blaze]] from talking with her patient, but he returned as the Ghost Rider and fled with Collier. Madam then summoned all her nurses, and they gave chase after they armed themselves from a cache of machine guns, grenades, and knives hidden within an angel statue.{{r|Ghost Rider Vol 6 #20}}

| Equipment               = Syringe filled with with same fiery rain that Zadkiel used to destroy Sodom and Gomorrah.
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = Machine guns, grenades, knives forged from the paving stones of [[Heaven (Paradise)|Heaven]]'s holy city.
